author: cvuosalo
body:
#### PR description:

Enhancements to DDCMS utilities to support the upcoming migration of the magnetic field geometry builder and other code. These new methods should not change the behavior of existing programs. Some error checking has been added to the `DDFilteredView` that could change the output of misbehaving programs.

Tracker migration to DD4hep requires some of these new utilities, so it would be helpful to merge this PR promptly.

#### PR validation:

Unit tests ran successfully. These utilities will be exercised more fully by the upcoming magnetic field geometry builder PR.

#### No backport.
title: Enhancements to support the magnetic field geometry builder
